com.glluch.findterms

Class Surrogate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glluch.findterms.Surrogate

  • public class Surrogate
extends Object
    Given a term return all related terms in the taxonomy. The taxonomy must have relations "wide" and "narrowed". For a term, this class can retrieve one or both of them.
    Author:
    Guillem LLuch Moll guillem72@gmail.com

      • getSurrogates

        public ArrayList<String> getSurrogates(String mode)
        Retrieve the terms related to the surrogate.term in the model
        Parameters:
        mode - In this implementation could be "wide" or "narrowed".
        Returns:
        An array of Terms with the relation "mode", from the label of the RDF/XML.

      • getSurrogates

        public ArrayList<String> getSurrogates()
        Retrieve the terms related to the surrogate.term in the model.
        Returns:
        An array of terms related to this.term in all modes

      • preQuery

        protected String preQuery(String mode,
                          String term_id)
        Prepare the statement for a sparql command.
        Parameters:
        mode - Could be "wide" or "narrowed"
        term_id - It is the term in uppercase and underscore instead of spaces
        Returns:
        The sentence to be done in a string

      • surrogatesForeach

        public HashMap<String,ArrayList<String>> surrogatesForeach(ArrayList<String> terms)
        Given a terms[], get the list of related terms.
        Parameters:
        terms - a list of term. The function return the related terms for each one.
        Returns:
        an array term -> term[]
